Package gov.tak.api.engine.map.cache

Class DownloadTriggerStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.api.engine.map.cache.DownloadTriggerStatus
  • public final class DownloadTriggerStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the status of a download initiated in the caching service

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DownloadTriggerStatus​(int triggerId, DownloadStatus downloadStatus, int completedTileCount, int totalTileCount, long startTimeUTC, long estimatedBytesRemaining, double estimatedSecondsRemaining, double currentBytesPerSecond)
      Create a status event

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getCompletedTileCount()
      The current number of tiles downloaded
      double getCurrentBytesPerSecond()
      The current download bytes-per-second rate
      DownloadStatus getDownloadStatus()
      Current status of the download
      long getEstimatedBytesRemaining()
      Estimate of how many bytes remain pending in the download
      double getEstimatedSecondsRemaining()
      Estimate of how many seconds remain in the download given the current rate
      long getStartTimeUTC()
      The time in UTC when the download was initiated
      int getTotalTileCount()
      The total number of tiles associated with the download request
      int getTriggerId()
      The unique trigger ID that references a previous DownloadCacheTrigger trigger ID

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadTriggerStatus

        public DownloadTriggerStatus​(int triggerId,
                             DownloadStatus downloadStatus,
                             int completedTileCount,
                             int totalTileCount,
                             long startTimeUTC,
                             long estimatedBytesRemaining,
                             double estimatedSecondsRemaining,
                             double currentBytesPerSecond)
        Create a status event
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the trigger id that references a previous DownloadCacheTrigger
        downloadStatus - the current download status
        completedTileCount - the current number of tiles downloaded
        totalTileCount - the total number of tiles associated with the download request
        startTimeUTC - the time in UTC when the download was initiated
        estimatedBytesRemaining - estimate of how many bytes remain pending in the download
        estimatedSecondsRemaining - estimate of how many seconds remain in the download given the current rate
        currentBytesPerSecond - the current download bytes-per-second rate
